welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Stevensville! Known for its charming small-town feel and breathtaking views of the Bitterroot Mountains, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our lovely city has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lee Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lee Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Easton Airport serves all commercial flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Easton Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at BWI Airport houses both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A serves primarily Southwest Airlines and some international carriers.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B serves primarily Delta and United Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C serves primarily American Airlines and some international carriers.

wifi.note: Complimentary Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Glenn L Martin Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tipton AAF Airport provides services for both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Tipton AAF Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering exclusive amenities and services.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'Tipton WiFi' and accepting the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cambridge Airport serves all commercial flights and provides various amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Cambridge Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering exclusive services and facilities.

wifi.note: Passengers can access complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.
